FuncDef: This command configures a transit prefix subscriber ip address prefix. It is used when the site is on the local side, being the same side of the system as the parent SAP. The local aa-sub-ip addresses represent the src-IP in the from-SAP direction and dest-IP in the to-SAP direction.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the address type of the subscriber address prefix associated with this transit prefix policy entry.
